Vampire masterminds are evil wizards who control entire cabals of the undead and instill fear in the hearts of mortals far and wide. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 26 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 [Vampire Mastermind](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3226) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 337 1.1 **Perception** +20; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20); plus one regional language **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +17, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +21, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +20, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +22, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +19, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19 **Str** +3 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +5 **Children of the Night** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) **Items** signet ring --- **AC** 27 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +18 **Will** +20 **HP** 115 (coffin restoration, [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=62) 10, [void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Resistances** physical 10 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2920)) **Vampire Vulnerabilities**
**Mist Escape** --- **Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet **Melee** claw +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d8+9 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=45) **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 29, attack +19 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286) - **1st** [Dizzying Colors](/Spells.aspx?ID=1500) (Ã—2), [Enfeeble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1513), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122) - **2nd** [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Floating Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=1533), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [Stupefy](/Spells.aspx?ID=1691) - **3rd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) - **4th** [Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Vision of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=1742), [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=55)** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127)) Giant bat with fangs +19 for 2d8+9 piercing. **Create Servitor** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Downtime](/Traits.aspx?ID=49)) **Dominate** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) DC 26 **Drain Bonded Item** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirements** The vampire mastermind hasn't acted yet on this turn; **Effect** The vampire expends the power stored in their signet ring. This gives the vampire the ability to cast one prepared spell they had already previously cast today without spending a spell slot. The vampire must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements. **Drink Blood** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) When Drinking Blood, the vampire mastermind regains 10 HP. **Steady Spellcasting** If another creature's reaction would disrupt the vampire mastermind's spellcasting action, the vampire attempts a DC 15 flat check. If the vampire succeeds, their action isn't disrupted. **Turn to Mist** ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127))
